mapper.select: SELECT A.MCHN_INFO_ID AS mchnInfoId ,A.TOOL_NM AS mchnHanNm ,A.TOOL_NM AS mchnNm ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('MCHN_PRCT_ST' , A.MCHN_USE_PSBL_YN) as mchnUsePsblNm ,A.MDL_NM AS mdlNm ,A.MKR_NM AS mkrNm ,A.MCHN_EXPL AS mchnExpl ,CASE WHEN A.OPN_YN = 'Y' THEN 'OPEN' ELSE '' END AS opnNm ,A.OPN_YN AS opnYn ,A.MCHN_SMRY AS mchnSmry ,SU.SA_NAME AS crgrNm ,SU.SA_DEPT_NAME AS deptNm ,F.ATTC_FIL_ID AS attcFilId ,F.SEQ AS seq ,DBO.FN_GETUSEREMAIL(SU.SA_USER) as crgrMail ,A.MCHN_CL_CD AS mchnClCd ,A.VER AS ver ,A.CMPN_NM AS cmpnNm ,dbo.fn_getEvWay(A.MCHN_INFO_ID) AS evWay ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('SPACE_EV_CTGR' , A.MCHN_CL_CD) as evCtrgNm FROM IRIS_SPACE_MCHN_INFO_MGMT A LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL F ON F.ATTC_FIL_ID = A.ATTC_FIL_ID AND F.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER SU ON SU.SA_SABUN_NEW = A.MCHN_CRGR_ID WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.MCHN_INFO_ID = #{mchnInfoId}

SELECT A.MCHN_PRCT_ID AS mchnPrctId ,A.MCHN_INFO_ID AS mchnInfoId ,A.PRCT_TITL AS prctTitl ,M.TOOL_NM AS mchnHanNm
,A.PRCT_FROM_DT AS prctFromDt ,A.PRCT_TO_DT AS prctToDt ,A.RGST_ID AS rgstId ,M.MCHN_SMRY AS mchnSmry ,B.SA_DEPT_NEW AS deptCd ,DBO.FN_GETSABUNNAME(A.RGST_ID) AS rgstNm ,DBO.FN_GETDEPTNAME(B.SA_DEPT_NEW) AS deptNm ,DBO.FN_GETUSEREMAIL(C.SA_USER) as crgrMail ,C.SA_NAME AS crgrNm ,A.PRCT_SCN_CD AS prctScnCd ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('MCHN_APPR_RQ_ST', A.PRCT_SCN_CD) as prctScnNm FROM IRIS_SPACE_MCHN_PRCT_MST A INNER JOIN IRIS_SPACE_MCHN_INFO_MGMT M ON M.MCHN_INFO_ID = A.MCHN_INFO_ID INNER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER B ON B.SA_SABUN_NEW = A.RGST_ID INNER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER C ON C.SA_SABUN_NEW = M.MCHN_CRGR_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.MCHN_PRCT_ID = #{mchnPrctId}

SELECT A.MCHN_PRCT_ID AS mchnPrctId ,A.PRCT_TITL AS prctTitl ,A.RGST_ID AS rgstId ,DATENAME(D, B.PRCT_DT) AS dateNo ,DBO.FN_GETSABUNNAME(A.RGST_ID) AS rgstNm ,B.PRCT_DT AS prctDt ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('MCHN_APPR_RQ_ST', A.PRCT_SCN_CD) as prctScnNm FROM IRIS_SPACE_MCHN_PRCT_MST A, IRIS_SPACE_MCHN_PRCT_DTL B WHERE A.MCHN_PRCT_ID = B.MCHN_PRCT_ID AND A.DEL_YN ='N' AND A.MCHN_INFO_ID = #{mchnInfoId} AND A.PRCT_SCN_CD IN ('RQ', 'APPR') AND B.PRCT_DT LIKE '%'+#{srhDt}+'%' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY B.PRCT_DT

SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM IRIS_SPACE_MCHN_PRCT_MST M, IRIS_SPACE_MCHN_PRCT_DTL D WHERE M.MCHN_PRCT_ID = D.MCHN_PRCT_ID AND M.DEL_YN ='N' AND M.PRCT_SCN_CD IN ('RQ', 'APPR') AND M.MCHN_INFO_ID = #{mchnInfoId} AND D.PRCT_DT BETWEEN #{prctFromDt} AND #{prctToDt}
